survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personalized Travel Planning Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered personalized travel planning assistants, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered travel planning assistants?
